name: Linea
description: Linea is the Layer 2 built from first principles to strengthen Ethereum and the entire ETH economy. Every aspect of its design—from its productive ETH burn mechanics, and capital efficient native yield, to its underlying Ethereum-equivalent zk tech—amplifies the value and utility of Ethereum Mainnet. All of this is backed by the largest ecosystem fund in the space, managed by the most trusted Ethereum builders. With institutional-grade infrastructure, and deep integration across DeFi, Linea is the best chain for ETH capital, where every transaction and every block strengthens Ethereum. Linea is where Ethereum wins.
